name: NSSharingService.Name
desc: Constants that describe the sharing services that macOS supports.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a sharing service name using the provided string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a sharing service name using the specified raw value.

items.name: static let addToAperture: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that shares an item provider’s contents with Aperture.

items.name: static let addToIPhoto: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that shares an item provider’s contents with iPhoto.

items.name: static let addToSafariReadingList: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that shares an item provider’s contents with Safari’s Reading List.

items.name: static let cloudSharing: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that shares an item provider’s contents with other iCloud users.

items.name: static let composeEmail: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that uses an item provider’s contents to compose an email.

items.name: static let composeMessage: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that uses an item provider’s contents to compose a message.

items.name: static let sendViaAirDrop: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that sends an item provider’s contents to another device using AirDrop.

items.name: static let useAsDesktopPicture: NSSharingService.Name
items.desc: A service that sets the item provider’s contents as the current user’s desktop picture.
